Eligible participant attend 6 in-person clinic visit comparative test 4 bean variety versus lentils rice .
DOC.brief_title: Bioavailability Compounds From Different Bean Varieties Healthy Individuals .
DOC.detailed_description: This single site , blind , randomize , control study design examine phytochemical absorption , metabolism excretion , well vascular health satiety , ingestion 4 different bean variety ( pinto , navy , red kidney , black ) . Recruitment consist total 8 volunteer . Volunteers recruit advertisement local community . The study conduct I.H . Asper Clinical Research Institute , locate St. Boniface Hospital . Participants ask provide write informed consent prior participation study . Participants provide write consent ask attend in-patient visit provide fast blood sample . Should participant eligible participate , schedule six study visit assess bioavailability , metabolism excretion phytochemical present bean compare lentil white rice . Uptake , metabolism excretion phytochemical present different variety bean acute phase test healthy individual examine . Possible relationship phytochemical composition bean , arterial function satiety investigate secondary objective .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Males female , ≥18 ≤50 year ; 2 . Normal blood lipid profile , creatinine ≥7 units/L ≤56 units/L , alanine aminotransferase ( ALT ) ≥0.7 mg/dL ≤1.3 mg/dL men ≥0.6 mg/dL ≤1.1 mg/dL woman , glycated hemoglobin < 6 % ; 3 . Blood pressure < 140/90 4 . Body mass index ( BMI ) ≥20 < 30 ; 5 . Stable regime past 3 month take vitamin mineral/dietary/ herbal supplement ; 6 . Agree eat bean beanbased food , lentil lentilbased food , consume isoflavone supplement participate study ; 7 . Willing comply protocol requirement ; 8 . Willing provide inform consent . 1 . Allergies bean , bean flour bean product , lentils rice ; 2 . Presence clinically diagnose disease affect circulatory , respiratory , immune , skeletal , urinary , muscular , endocrine , digestive , nervous reproductive system require medical treatment ; 3 . Taking prescribed medication last 3 month ( exception birth control ) supplement affect gastrointestinal function last 3 month ; 4 . Weight loss ≥3 kg body weight within 6 month prior enrol study ; 5 . Current ( within last month ) bacterial , viral fungal infection , overthecounter medication within past 72 hour ; 6 . Pregnant lactating ; 7 . Unable obtain blood sample screen visit first study visit .
